text: Dawn of Chromatica is the third remix album by American singer-songwriter Lady Gaga. It was released on September 3, 2021, by Interscope Records. The song features all 13 tracks from the standard version of her sixth studio album, Chromatica (2020), in a remixed format. == Track listing == Credits from iTunes metadata. == References == Category:2021 albums Category:Lady Gaga albums Category:Remix albums
title: Dawn of Chromatica
